All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoardPlayer
Represents the player's board in the Battleship game.
Carrier
Represents an aircraft carrier ship in the Battleship game.
Cell
Represents a cell on the Battleship game board.
CellData
 
Destroyer
Represents a Destroyer ship in the Battleship game.
FileManager
 
Frigate
Represents a Frigate ship in the Battleship game.
GameController
Controller for the main game view.
GameStage
Singleton class representing the game stage for the Battleship game.
GameState
 
LoseController
Controller for the Lose screen in the Battleship game.
LoseStage
A JavaFX Stage representing the Lose screen of the Battleship game.
MachineThread
Thread that handles the machine's turn in the Battleship game.
MachineThread.MachineShotListener
Listener interface for machine shot events.
Main
* Main class to launch the Battleship JavaFX application.
SelectionController
Controller for the ship selection and placement stage.
SelectionStage
A JavaFX Stage representing the Selection screen of the Battleship game.
SerializableFileHandler
 
Ship
Abstract class representing a Ship in the Battleship game.
ShipData
 
ShipOrientation
Enum representing the orientation of a ship in the Battleship game.
ShipPlacementException
Exception thrown when there is an error in placing a ship on the game board.
ShipPlacer
Class responsible for enabling drag-and-drop functionality for ships on the game board.
ShotResult
Enum representing the result of a shot in the Battleship game.
Submarine
Class representing a Submarine ship in the Battleship game.
SunkenShape
A JavaFX Group representing a sunken ship shape composed of various polygons and curves.
TimerThread
TimerThread is responsible for managing a countdown timer in the game.
TouchedShape
A JavaFX Group representing a touched ship shape composed of various shapes.
WaterShape
A JavaFX Group representing a water shape composed of lines.
WelcomeStage
A JavaFX Stage representing the Welcome screen of the Battleship game.
WelcomeStageController
Controller class for the Welcome Stage of the Battleship game.
WinStage
A JavaFX Stage representing the Welcome screen of the Battleship game.
WinStageController
Controller class for the Win Stage.
